Name: Modern Warfighter Rails
Description:
Adds an assortment of MLOK rails and risers that allow for further customization of weapons.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CONTENTS

- UTG Risers (.5"/.75"/1" heights in 3-slot and 13 slot lengths)
- MLOK Rails (FDE/OD/Black colors in 3-slot, 5-slot, 7-slot, 9-slot, 11-slot, and cantilever-type rails)
- LWRC RailSkin rail covers (Black, Brown, FDE, OD Green, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
